dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: I am very happy that you want to be the new steward of this old tavern.

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: People really seem to like this place somehow ...

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: The previous owner sold a bunch of weapons to the tavern folk to make some money.

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: Not sure where he got them to be honest.

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: But some questions need no answering I guess.

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: At least not as long as the money is right.

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: On that point, make sure you pay your rent in time.

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: Otherwise we might have to go looking for a new tavern keeper again ...

dialog.speaker: Major
dialog.line: Best of luck to you, I guess.
